ai-patthana15.46:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.46:1.1_0: mind consciousness arises dependent on the eighteen mental preoccupations. ...
ai-patthana15.46:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.46:2.1_0: mind is no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.46:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.46:2.1_3: What is an unshakable, in the three ways?
